name: Spectral Trail
description:
Set in a fictional universe in the year of 23XX, Spectral Trail is a pseudo-3D action FPS where you take the position of Klaus, a military wrongly sent to a ghost-filled maze called Xeoncor. There, Klaus must find the seven hidden rings in order to be able to disrupt the power and get out of there as fast as he can. With so many threats, this challenge might not be so easy!

> Main features:
- Four different weapons hidden in the maze;
- A open world, 3-sectors maze;
- Ghosts that drops a spectral trail when hit, useful not to get lost;
- Retro-style, pseudo-3D graphics;
- Energy-based shooting system;
- Built-in speedrun timer.
